title: REP4: Automated Testing and Repairing Programmable Data Planes
data:
W Li, F Li, C Liu, X Wang- 2025 IEEE/ACM 33rd International Symposium on, 2025
While the P4-based programmable data plane supports flexible configuration 
regardless of specific hardware or protocols, potential software and hardware 
failures threaten its performance. However, existing tools fail to efficiently test and 
automatically repair faults, relying on time-consuming and error-prone manual 
manipulation. To address these challenges, we propose REP4, a system that 
automatically detects, localizes, and repairs bugs in programmable data planes

title: PatchSeeker: Mapping NVD Records to their Vulnerability-fixing Commits with LLM Generated Commits and Embeddings
data:
HH Nguyen, AT Nguyen, T Le-Cong, Y Li, HW Ang- arXiv preprint arXiv, 2025

National Vulnerability Database (NVD) is the authoritative source for cataloging
